weka.gui.beans
Class AbstractTrainingSetProducer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  weka.gui.beans.AbstractTrainingSetProducer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, BeanCommon, TrainingSetProducer, Visible
Direct Known Subclasses:
TrainingSetMaker
public abstract class AbstractTrainingSetProducer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements TrainingSetProducer, Visible, BeanCommon, java.io.Serializable

Abstract class for TrainingSetProducers that contains default implementations of add/remove listener methods and default visual representation

Since:
1.0
Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Mark Hall
See Also:
TrainingSetProducer, Serialized Form
